p: We observed that the increase in the proportion of patients initiating ART was accompanied by a reduction in the time to treatment from 5.6 months in the first period to less than 1 month in the last period (0.8 months). Moreover, the majority of patients (76%) initiated their treatment within three months after eligibility. These results are similar to those observed in other studies. A study in India [ 28] found that 67% of eligible patients started treatment within three months after eligibility and in Uganda, 64.5% began treatment three months after eligibility, for the period 2007â€“2011[ 29].
